sentences.en: Conceivably, he is telling the truth for once.
sentences.cn: 说不定他就这一次说的是真话.

sentences.en: Conceivably, that is an inspired question.
sentences.cn: 可以想象, 那是经人授意而提出的问题.

sentences.en: Could bronzium conceivably be used to make some sort of a weapon?
sentences.cn: 玄铁铜可以被用来制造某种武器 么 ?

sentences.en: For example, we could conceivably all grow our own food and provide our own medical care.
sentences.cn: 假设我们可以耕作并提供医护两不误.

sentences.en: He couldn't conceivably have ( ie I don't believe he could have ) meant what he said.
sentences.cn: 他的话想来不会是他的原意.

sentences.en: Six months, a year -- five years, conceivably.
sentences.cn: 六个月, 一年 —— 五年, 这都想象得出来.

sentences.en: So conceivably, this thing could be used to create a pandemic.
sentences.cn: 因此可以想象, 这个仪器可以用来造成大瘟疫.

sentences.en: Thus, inhibition of this mechanism could conceivably enhance the effect of norepinephrine.
sentences.cn: 因此可以想象, 抑制这种机制可以增强去甲肾上腺素的作用.

words.tran_cn: 可能的；想得到的，可想像的
令人信服地；可相信地；想得到地
